translated: The disease of separation from one's beloved, which is the cause of the destruction of the body, is the enemy of love, the enemy of life, the enemy of wealth, the enemy of fame, the enemy of happiness, the enemy of beauty, the enemy of youth, the enemy of all good fortune.🔽The king said, What is the remedy for this disease of separation?🔽The minister said, The remedy for this disease of separation is the union with one's beloved.🔽The king said, How can I obtain the union with my beloved?🔽The minister said, Your Majesty, the union with your beloved is possible through the power of the king's merit and the power of the king's wealth.🔽The king said, What is the cause of the king's merit and the king's wealth?🔽The minister said, The cause of the king's merit and the king's wealth is the king's own good fortune.🔽The king said, What is the cause of the king's own good fortune?🔽The minister said, The cause of the king's own good fortune is the king's own good deeds.🔽The king said, What is the cause of the king's own good deeds?🔽The minister said, The cause of the king's own good deeds is the king's own faith.
